title: Calories in 16 oz Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in 16 oz ribeye steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Boneless ribeye steak, choice grade, broiled or grilled without added fat; includes marbling but no bone; cooked to medium.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion accuracy. Consult labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A 16 oz ribeye steak provides about 1321 kcal and 108 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Trim visible fat before cooking (reduces ~20% fat per 100 g)
Add 1 tbsp butter during cooking per 100 g
Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 1321 kcal for a cooked, boneless ribeye.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 16 oz ribeye?

faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain ribeye steak.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in ribeye?
faqs.a: Grilling or broiling minimizes added calories; frying or butter basting increases them significantly.

faqs.q: Is 16 oz ribeye high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 42 g saturated fat due to marbling; trim fat to reduce.
